Package ohos.ai.cv.text

Class TextConfiguration.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.ai.cv.common.VisionConfiguration.Builder<TextConfiguration.Builder>
      • ohos.ai.cv.text.TextConfiguration.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    TextConfiguration

    public static class TextConfiguration.Builder
extends VisionConfiguration.Builder<TextConfiguration.Builder>
    A nested class used to create a TextConfiguration object.

    This class passes plug-in parameters to the TextConfiguration object. The parameter values are passed by the caller, and the value range is determined by the variable type.

    Since:
    1

        public TextConfiguration.Builder setLevel​(int level)
        Sets the detection level.
        Parameters:

        Returns a TextConfiguration.Builder object with the specified detection level.

      • setIsTracking

        public TextConfiguration.Builder setIsTracking​(int tracking)
        Sets whether to enable text tracking.
        Parameters:
        tracking - Specifies whether to enable text tracking. Sets 1 if text tracking is set to performed; sets 0 otherwise.
        Returns:
        Returns a TextConfiguration.Builder object with text tracking enabled or disabled, as specified by tracking.
        Since:
        1

      • setTrackingRelease

        public TextConfiguration.Builder setTrackingRelease​(int release)
        Sets whether to release text tracking resources.
        Parameters:
        release - Specifies whether to release text tracking resources. Sets 1 if text tracking resources are set to be released; sets 0 otherwise.
        Returns:
        Returns a TextConfiguration.Builder object with text tracking resources released or not released, as specified by release.
        Since:
        1

      • setTrackingForceOcr

        public TextConfiguration.Builder setTrackingForceOcr​(int forceOcr)
        Sets whether to enable forcible text detection during text tracking.
        Parameters:
        forceOcr - Specifies whether to enable forcible text detection during text tracking. Sets 1 if text detection is set to be forced during text tracking; sets 0 otherwise.
        Returns:
        Returns a TextConfiguration.Builder object with forcible text detection enabled or disabled, as specified by forceOcr, during text tracking.
        Since:
        1
